channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Gene Hackman and his wife tested negative for carbon monoxide, sheriff says
item.description: Authorities investigating the deaths of Oscar-winner Gene Hackman and his wife are waiting for more details from their autopsies to determine why they died.

item.title: For Gene Hackman, Santa Fe was a refuge from the limelight
Leonard Peltier remains defiant in AP interview, maintaining innocence and vowing continued activism
